channel.title: Unreachable Statement?
channel.description:
Im getting this error in my case 17: (Second Click Npc)
I haven't even touched that and when i compiled i get this
[code] client.java:6672: unreachable statement if (PutNPCCoords == true) { ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Any help? :|

item.title: Unreachable Statement?
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

Im trying to add fishing onto my server, Ive added this…

public void FishLobster(int NpcID, int playerid) {
       
        boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
        int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);

        switch (NpcID) {

        case 234:
            Fishing t = new Fishing(playerid, "lobster", 377, 40, 619, 301,
                    250);

            skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
            skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
            break;
        }
    }

    public void FishShark(int NpcID, int playerid) {
       
        boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
        int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);

        switch (NpcID) {

        case 233:
            Fishing t = new Fishing(playerid, "shark", 383, 75, 618, 311, 400);

            skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
            skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
            break;
        }
    }

    public void FishShrimp(int NpcID, int playerid) {
       
        boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
        int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);

        switch (NpcID) {

        case 235:
        case 236:
            Fishing t = new Fishing(playerid, "shrimp", 317, 0, 621, 303, 100);

            skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
            skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
            break;
        }
    }

    public void FishManta(int NpcID, int playerid) {
       
        boolean PutNPCCoords = false;
        int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);

        switch (NpcID) {

        case 316:
            Fishing t = new Fishing(playerid, "manta", 389, 89, 618, 311, 1000);

            skillX = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absX;
            skillY = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].absY;
            break;
        }
    }

Those voids into my client.Java

And added

boolean FishingGo = false;

Into my Case 155

The only other things ive added was a fishing handler…

Read full topic
